# Analyzing a Backdoor/Bot for the MIPS Platform

**[sans.org/reading-room/whitepapers/malicious/analyzing-backdoor-bot-mips-platform-35902](https://www.sans.org/reading-room/whitepapers/malicious/analyzing-backdoor-bot-mips-platform-35902)**

Megan Roddie

Malware functionalities have been evolving and so are their target platforms and
architectures. Non-PC appliances of different architectures have not traditionally been
frequent targets of malware. However, many of those appliances, due to their enhanced
processing power and/or low maintenance,...

By Muhammad Junaid Bohio

April 13, 2015
